summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and the East Duwamish South Greenbelt, accepting the offer of James and Evelyn Fleagle to convey a portion of Hendrickson's Addition and Southside Garden Tracts to The City of Seattle for park, recreation, open space and greenbelt purposes, providing for the payment therefor from funds previously authorized and authorizing acceptance of the deed upon delivery.
